MS MCQs

    Create your first Azure IoT Central app - Create a rich dashboard and a real device

    »

    1. Which option includes all of the capability types available in a device template?

      Telemetry, commands, properties

      Telemetry, state, event, location

      Telemetry, state, commands


    2. What is the purpose of the Name attribute that appears in all device template elements?

      It names the element in the IoT Central portal UI.

      It describes the element.

      It enables communication by matching the entries in the code that runs on the IoT device.

      It appears in tooltips when the operator selects an element in the app UI.


    3. What is a writeable property?

      A property that can be written to in the device app but not changed by the IoT Central app.

      A property that can be written to by the IoT Central app but not by the device app.

      A property that can be written to by the IoT Central app. It is picked up by the device app.


    4. What control makes a device template available for use?

      Publish

      Save

      Views

      Delete
